hey ken,

yeah i read you're paper and looked over it several more times. i 
guess what i don't understand is how exactly the camera's work. for 
example, how are they coded to take in information and how does the 
distance to the object only come down to one input into the neural 
network.

timmy

> Timmy,
> 
> Did you read our paper "Competitive Coevolution through 
Evolutionary

>

> ken
